title: Localize in Ukrainian and Russian
description: ウクライナ、ロシア、東欧には多くの開発者がおり、これらの言語で必要な情報を提供してくれると嬉しいです。

f6_assessments.q0: Translation of the listed resources would obviously be of great help to Ukrainian and Russian Dev's. Perhaps this proposal should be in the multi-lingual resources challenge though?
f6_assessments.q1: Whilst the proposer likely has the skillset to produce the translations listed, the plan could be firmed as to exactly what will be translated and by when. Is this just everything so far, or going forward for a certain amount of time. Basically how much will be translated for the requested funding, and when will this be delivered?
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is a little vague on the exact deliverables and timeframes associated with them which would make auditing delivery harder. Some KPI's around expected views/downloads of the resources would also be great to track success.

f6_assessments.q0:
In my opinion this proposal could improve the developer participations in the Cardano community and the developer work on cardano blockchain, but It isn't clearly articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for the stakeholders (in deep detail for users, developers and so on.. ).
However the objective of the proposal is interesting and it's good for growth the localizations, but I think it's important to improve details about the solution for the challenge, so it's difficult to assess.
f6_assessments.q1: It's not simple to define if the proposer team states has the necessary experience, because it's clear the experience in vertical and localization, but I don't discover team member details and professional experience to imagine the project's success. The metrics for the assessment isn't given, so it's impossible to assess what the proposer wants to do, but the success of his actions is not defined. Roadmap and milestones (incl. time horizon) are not described.
f6_assessments.q2: Roadmap and milestones (incl. time horizon) are not described. The budget's information provided is very poor and it is difficult assess,  and therefore say that  it is not appropriate. There aren't KPI to identify the proposal goal, but only deliverables. There aren't more details how the budget is going to be spent, also I'm trying to discover attachment to deep dive the solution. Futhermore there aren't basic information to asses.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal itself is great, however might be that the multilingual resources is the right challenge for it.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer experience is given. If it will be done by one person that might take long, otherwise sharing the translation detailed plan could help.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal could be break down and work packages are auditable. Providing additional information about detailed time plan and work package cost estimations would help.

f6_assessments.q0: The Ukrainian and Russian developer community is strong, and it will be great to get them on board in the Cardano ecosystem. The language barrier is a serious stumbling block. The availability of Subtitles/speech over in these languages will attract a lot of software talents from the Ukrainian and Russian software community to Cardano. There is a serious void in this regard, and the proposal effectively addresses the same.
f6_assessments.q1: The translation work is not likely to have serious challenges. In order to perform effective translation basic understanding of the Cardano ecosystem is likely to be sufficient and the proposer claim association with Cardano for a reasonable length of time. Even though the proposer has not enclosed any references to any past work in translation it is fairly safe to assume that as a person involved in Cardano community and with knowledge of both the languages the task is likely to be accomplished successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal list Plutus Pioneer Program, Charles video, and many other sources. Except for the Plutus Pioneer Program, other sources are open-ended and translation of the complete list is likely to be beyond the scope. Therefore there is a requirement to clearly define the quantum of translation that will be performed. The open-ended task list is difficult to interpret and evaluate. However, assuming the proper will translate Plutus pioneer program completely and Cardano official documentation is likely to be sufficient for the cost of the project.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal wants to translate projects in Cardano into local languages (Ukrainian and Russian). As this challenge is made for initiatives that will enhance the developer ecosystem this proposal fits into this challenge. To assess impact better, the proposer could have provided more context, how many people he wants to reach and how many non-English-speaker are working in a similar environment as Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: Andrii is very active in the community since Fund 1 and has proven is ability and willingness to help Cardano to grow. The provided plan is simple but adequate. The content that he wants to translate is critical in Cardano (Plutus Pioneers Program etc.). I would be interested if he could also translate the town hall live or hosting breakout rooms in community events. That would probably bring the non-English-speaker even closer to the community. More details about the budget would help to assess its appropriateness. Overall, I expect that Andrii will deliver his proposal successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The deliverables are clear. However, it would be helpful in terms of auditability to add some metrics like number of devs he want to reach. Also what is the timeframe that the budget meant for? Overall, as I expect Andrii to deliver this proposal, the community will be able to see the result (translated content) very easy, therefore auditability is possible.

experience: Project Catalyst Fund1参加者、カルダノコミュニティでの活動、翻訳（暗号を含む）の経験が豊富。
